title: Bugged client or just dog computer
body:
Hey so i'm actually pretty new to League so I dont know if this is normal or not BUT, i'm getting this wacky thingo where it shows all my friends as offline (not on League+ or anything) and all of their pfp disabled. At the end of games it also says you have been kicked from the party and two pop ups the top right hand corner. Is it normal or should I just restart my laptop a bit..
Thanks, sorry if this is normal and im talking nonsense!
(also if you need screenshots lmk <3)

replies.body: I have the same issue, can't spectate anyone nor can I visit their profiles {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

There's been a few odd bugs in the pre-season client, so even if they can't fix it straight away, it will help them track the issue and make the fix faster.
